Highlighted Clause: We do not provide you any benefits, workers' compensation, or insurance coverage.
Plain Language Summary: The company does not offer any employee benefits, compensation for work-related injuries, or insurance to users.

Highlighted Clause: We may, in our sole discretion, terminate this agreement, suspend access to our website, or remove any services immediately without notice for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: The company can end the agreement with you, block your access to their website, or stop providing services at any time without prior notice, for any reason they see fit.

Highlighted Clause: Unless otherwise expressly agreed to by both parties in writing, you will provide full payment for all invoices issued within thirty (30) days after the mailing date of the invoice.
Plain Language Summary: Unless specified otherwise in a written agreement by both parties, you must pay all invoices within 30 days of when they're issued.

Highlighted Clause: We reserve the right to create, edit, or revoke your qualifications and skills at any time, for any reason or no reason at all.
Plain Language Summary: The company has the right to change or remove any qualifications or skills they have given you at any time, with or without a reason.

Highlighted Clause: You alone are responsible for complying with federal, state, provincial, and local laws in connection with your use of the services.
Plain Language Summary: You are responsible for following all applicable laws when you use the company's services.

Highlighted Clause: If your subscription includes any monthly or annual fees or monthly or annual minimums, you will still be responsible for paying for all services fees through the end of that month or year, respectively.
Plain Language Summary: If you have a subscription with monthly or yearly fees, you must pay all service fees until the end of the current month or year, even if you stop using the services before then.

Highlighted Clause: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless for any assessments against us because you failed to comply with any tax laws.
Plain Language Summary: You agree to protect the company from any legal penalties or costs that might result from your failure to follow tax laws.

Highlighted Clause: In no event will we be liable for any special, consequential, incidental, exemplary or indirect costs or damages, litigation costs, installation and removal costs, or loss of data, production or profit.
Plain Language Summary: The company won't be held responsible for any significant, additional, or unintended costs or damages, legal fees, or losses related to data, production, or profits.

Highlighted Clause: The services are provided on an "as is" basis.
Plain Language Summary: The services are offered as they are, without any guarantees of functionality or quality.

Highlighted Clause: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless for any claims against us because you failed to comply with any law or violated any third party rights, including without limitation contractual, intellectual property, or privacy rights.
Plain Language Summary: You agree to protect the company from any legal claims resulting from your illegal actions or violations of someone else's rights, including contracts, intellectual property, or privacy.

Highlighted Clause: We may suspend, limit, or cancel your access to the services at any time for any reason, including because: (a) we believe you have violated these terms of service (including other related policies).
Plain Language Summary: The company can stop or limit your use of their services at any time, especially if they think you've broken the terms of service or related policies.

Highlighted Clause: We are not liable for any failure to perform services that is caused by your delay or failure to provide customer data.
Plain Language Summary: The company is not responsible if it cannot perform services because you did not provide the needed customer data on time.

Highlighted Clause: You may not assign these terms of service without our prior written consent.
Plain Language Summary: You cannot transfer this agreement to someone else without the company's written permission.

Highlighted Clause: We may revise and update these terms of service from time to time in our sole discretion.
Plain Language Summary: The company can change the terms of service when they want to.
